org.jl7.hl7
Class HL7SegmentGroup

java.lang.Object
  org.jl7.hl7.HL7SegmentGroup
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.lang.Iterable<HL7Segment>
public class HL7SegmentGroup
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.lang.Iterable<HL7Segment>

Represents a group of HL7 segments (typically returned by processing classes).

Since:
0.1
Author:
henribenoit

getSegmentGroups

public java.util.List<HL7SegmentGroup> getSegmentGroups(java.lang.String segmentType)
Returns a list of segment groups where each group starts with the first segment of one of the given types and ends with the last segment before a segment of one of the given types e.g. if the segment group contains the following segments: PID PV1 PV2 PID PV1 PID PV1 PV2, the following groups will be returned:
  • PID PV1 PV2
  • PID PV1
  • PID PV1 PV2

      • Parameters:
      segmentType - segment types (separated by pipes) to be searched for
      Returns:
      a list of segment groups
      Since:
      0.1

getSegmentGroups

public static java.util.List<HL7SegmentGroup> getSegmentGroups(java.lang.String segmentType,
                                                               java.util.List<HL7Segment> segmentList)
Returns a list of segment groups where each group starts with the first segment of one of the given types and ends with the last segment before a segment of one of the given types e.g. if the segment group contains the following segments: PID PV1 PV2 PID PV1 PID PV1 PV2, the following groups will be returned:
  • PID PV1 PV2
  • PID PV1
  • PID PV1 PV2

    • Parameters:
    segmentType - segment types (separated by pipes) to be searched for
    segmentList - list of segments to be processed.
    Returns:
    a list of segment groups
    Since:
    0.1
